title: History of a battle
creator_credit: Instituto Cubano del Arte e Industrias Cinematográficos (ICAIC) and Manuel Gomez
brief_description: This film is part of a series that constitutes a historical record of revolutionary development in Cuban society, with this particular one focusing on the literacy campaign of 1961. With English commentary.
